item.title: [Canada] The pediatrician said that if the cause was a virus, there was no medicine to treat it; the child could only pull through it
item.description: 01 Lingering fears As the saying goes, “Women are weak, but mothers are strong.” The dark cloud of COVID-19 had overshadowed Canada for more than a month. The one-year-old child had a lasting fever, diarrhea, and was wailing. The pediatrician said that if the virus caused it, there was no medicine to treat it; the child could only pull through it. Even non-parents would understand the mother’s anxiety and worries

item.title: [Canada] Coronavirus Vaccination | My journey of anti-rash
item.description: An unexpected visitor - “epidemic rash” The COVID-19 epidemic continues to ravage the world and disturb our daily lives. Not only does it affect the global economy and change everyone’s life and workstyle, but it also affects our physical and mental health. After nearly two years of a silent war against the epidemic and the promotion of vaccination, the epidemic seems to be at a turning point. Everyone seems to

item.title: 再次向海外儿童和孕妇免费派发新冠预防药
item.description: 是对我们最大的支持~ 海外疫情在变种奥米克隆的影响下，依然存在大量感染，我们决定在新年后，再一次面向在海外的孩子(15岁以下)和怀孕妇女免费派

item.title: About Us
item.description: Together, Fighting COVID-19 About Doctor About COVID-19 Free Consultation and Herbal Supplement Distribution Summary As of March 8, 2022, Global COVID-19 confirmed cases reach 448,735,674, with 6,012,002 deaths reported (Data from Johns Hopskins Covid-19 Map). As of February 2022, Dr. Yang and his team of volunteers have provided free online Covid-19 consultations and distributed herbal supplements to 20 countries around the world (see refer to table below); more than 500,000
item.dc:creator: 医行天下

item.title: Real story｜Mom's anti-cancer diary (Part one)
item.description: Preface This is a patient with advanced lung cancer who turned to Dr. Yang for help in April. The cancer had spread all over the body and metastasized to the bones. After Dr. Yang treating her for more than a month, she went for a PET/CT again. We can see that 70% of the cancer cells that had metastasized to the bones disappeared, and even the doctor examining the PET/CT
item.dc:creator: Dao of Healing

item.title: Preventive Traditional Chinese Herbal Supplements
item.description: 中文版 Today, after overcoming all kinds of obstacles, conquering all kinds of difficulties, and taking all kinds of risks, Dr. Yang and his team decided to post this Traditional Chinese Herbal Supplements (TCM) prescription here in hopes of helping more people in prevention: For healthy adults, take this prescription twice a day for 7 days; for adults of poor health, take this prescription twice a day for 10-14
